message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price, considering its worth to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to get a good deal.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is just too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short of that. How about $12,500?
